column1: Heorrenda was the son of a Men Eriol and an Elf Naimi (Éadgifu). In one version of the legendarium he was the one who completed the Golden Book
column2: in which was written the history of the Elder Days
column3: and it was kept in Tol Eressëa.

column1: He settled in the village of Tavrobel (later known as the wikipedia:Great Haywood; also known as Hǽgwudu se gréata in Old English).
Category:Characters in The Book of Lost Tales
